entry.title: Markdown Introduction
entry.content:
Markdown introduction
Software for Markdown

Markdown Basic command

Title

  • # for heading one

    Heading one

  • ## for heading two

    Heading two

  • ### for heading three

    Heading three

  • #### for heading four

    Heading four

Front Style

  • Italic: _content_

    italic

  • Blod: ** **

    Blod

Link

  • Inline Link

    [linkname](link)

  • Reference Link
    >

    [content][nickname]
[nickname]: URL "Showtext" //Can be use for multi lines

image

  • Inline Link

    ![alt text](url for image)

  • Reference Link

    same to Reference link of words

Lists

  • Bullet Point: ‘* content ‘

    • content 1
    • content 2

  • Number

    1. content
    2. content

Table

Header One Header Two Header Three
Left Center Right

Other

  • Blockquotes

    > content

  • Text Highlight

    Two point which near number 1

  • Soft Break

    Two space at the end of line

Reference Link

  1. Markdown——入门指南 by _Te_Lee_ on 2014-04-17: More
  2. Tutorial for Markdown: More
  3. Markdown-Wiki: More
  4. Markdown Document: More

entry.title: GitHub and Pages Introduction
entry.content:
GitHub Pages introduction
Hexo introduction and installing
Yelee installing

GitHub Pages with Hexo

Necessary Software/

  • Node.js
  • Git
  • Hexo

Command Summarize

  • Installing Hexo
    $ npm install hexo-cli -g
  • Creating Blog
    //Creating and initializing Blog. <folder> is the name of Blog
$ hexo init <folder>
  • Installing relevant packages
    $ cd <folder>
$ hexo install
  • Creating new pages
    $ hexo new page <folder>
  • Creating new post
    $ hexo new 'postname'
  • Testing Off-line
    $ hexo server
  • Testing Off-line
    $ hexo server
  • Transfering to Static website
    Using this command will create a public folder. Copy all files to GitHub Pages can update your website through GitHub Desktop App.
    $ hexo generate

Theme Yelee

  1. Setting Theme by following document: Yelee
  2. Create new item in the left.
    • using below code to create folder
    • Getting in to this folder and editing indexl.md
      $ hexo new page <folder>
  3. Add Google Code Prettify.
    • Folowing This

Reference

  • Hexo

    1. Hexo: More
    2. 20分钟教你使用hexo搭建github博客 by inerdstack on 2016-10-12: More
    3. Hexo 入门指南（三） - 文章 & 草稿 by 飞龙 on 2014-11-01: More
    4. 手把手教你用Hexo+Github 搭建属于自己的博客 by gdutxiaoxu on 2016-12-11: More

  • Yelee

    1. MOxFIVE Blog 2017-01-28: More
    2. MOxFIVE GitHub: More
    3. Yelee Document: More

  • Google Code Prettify

    1. Hexo优化之使用Google Prettify高亮代码 by 柳志超博客 on 2016-01-09: More

entry.title: Hello 2017
entry.content:
Happy Chinese New Year
New life begin

Blog Start

2017-01-28

Spending three days to build this Blog.
Feeling painful in it but leaning a lot.

Thank You

Thank you for everybody who helps and supports me in the 2016!

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
